title: Taking forever to login and once in super laggy
body: I haven't played league since Friday and today(sunday) i got on it takes a while for me to login then once I login it lags lags super hard when choosing champs and during game I am at 7 to 8 fps. Anyone know what's up with this?

replies.body:
being an FPS issue then it would be on your end since you will have to update your graphics drivers and what not.

that being said you may have to fiddle with the in game settings and lower them to get better FPS during game.

as for the client, not sure, it runs like its on console or something stuck at 30FPS for me but that has always done it since this version was in Beta.

Double check that there hasn't been a new graphics driver update you might have missed after some recent updates/patches, but also hit up our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for some basic troubleshooting, since that 7-8 fps worries me as well. 

If that guide and driver update doesn't really help out, go ahead and run a quick traceroute for me using something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to our NA server at 104.160.131.1. Post the results here so I can take a look!
